verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You were despised You were rejected Lord Those who passed by Even averted their gaze from Your sight Such was the suffering You bore for us Led like a lamb, a lamb to the slaughter You spoke not a word, but chose to be silent Though You did no wrong Nor was deceitfulness found in You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yet by Your wounds our salvation has come Yet by Your suffering our freedom is won{/lang-eng}
